content.content: Hello everyone, Starting to feel a bit like a broken record, but there will be no executive going up today and this is the pst that informs you of that  We announced this in yesterday’s Governance and Risk Call, much like the previous time I made this post, we simply do not have anything urgent or expected for the executive process this week and The Mandated Actors agreed it made the most sense to save the labor and not post an executive this week. Things are seeming to follow a bi-weekly cadence now and they’re hasn’t been any noticeable issues with that. Seems likely that this could continue to be the new norm, but until an official decision is made I will keep making these posts. As always, open for questions comments and concerns, thanks for reading!
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
